mapper.select: /* kr.kosmo.jobkorea.commonbiz.dao.MsgMgmtDao.selectMsgInfo */ SELECT REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(AA.EML_TITL, '#WRQ_DVS_COD_NM#', AB.WRQ_DVS_COD_NM) , '#OFC_NM#', AB.OFC_NM) , '#PTET_NM#', AB.PTET_NM ) AS EML_TITL , REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(AA.EML_CNTS, '#WRQ_DVS_COD_NM#', AB.WRQ_DVS_COD_NM) , '#OFC_NM#', AB.OFC_NM) , '#PTET_NM#', AB.PTET_NM) , '#REQ_DT#', AB.REQ_DT) , '#DLVR_SCDU_DT#', AB.DLVR_SCDU_DT) AS EML_CNTS , AA.TO_EML_ADRS , AA.SMS_TITL , AA.SMS_CNTS , AA.TO_PNN , AA.FST_ENLM_DTT , AA.FST_RGST_SST_ID , AA.FNL_MDFD_DTT , AA.FNL_MDFR_SST_ID FROM tc_msg_mgmt AA , ( SELECT BA.OFC_ID , IFNULL(BB.OFC_NM, '-') AS OFC_NM , BA.PTET_ID , IFNULL(BC.PTET_NM, '-') AS PTET_NM , BA.WRQ_DVS_COD , IFNULL(V_WRQ_DVS_COD.DTL_COD_NM, '-') AS WRQ_DVS_COD_NM , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(BA.REQ_DTT, '%Y.%m.%d'), '-') AS REQ_DT , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(BA.DLVR_SCDU_DT, '%Y.%m.%d'), '-') AS DLVR_SCDU_DT FROM tm_wrq_mst BA INNER JOIN tm_ofc_mst BB ON BA.OFC_ID = BB.OFC_ID INNER JOIN tm_ptet_mst BC ON BA.PTET_ID = BC.PTET_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DTL_COD , DTL_COD_NM , ODR FROM tc_comn_dtl_cod WHERE GRP_COD = 'WRQ_DVS_COD' ) V_WRQ_DVS_COD ON BA.WRQ_DVS_COD = V_WRQ_DVS_COD.DTL_COD WHERE BA.WRQ_ID = #{wrq_id} ) AB WHERE AA.MSG_ID = #{msg_id}

/* kr.kosmo.jobkorea.commonbiz.dao.MsgMgmtDao.selectMsgInfoPM */ SELECT REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(AA.EML_TITL, '#WRQ_DVS_COD_NM#', AB.WRQ_DVS_COD_NM) , '#OFC_NM#', AB.OFC_NM) , '#PTET_NM#', AB.PTET_NM ) AS EML_TITL , REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(AA.EML_CNTS, '#WRQ_DVS_COD_NM#', AB.WRQ_DVS_COD_NM) , '#OFC_NM#', AB.OFC_NM) , '#PTET_NM#', AB.PTET_NM) ,'#DLVR_DT#', AB.DLVR_DT) , '#DLVR_INFO#', AB.DLVR_INFO) ,'#RCVR_NM#',AB.RCVR_NM) , '#CURR_INFO#', AB.CURR_INFO) AS EML_CNTS , AA.TO_EML_ADRS , AA.SMS_TITL , AA.SMS_CNTS , AA.TO_PNN , AA.FST_ENLM_DTT , AA.FST_RGST_SST_ID , AA.FNL_MDFD_DTT , AA.FNL_MDFR_SST_ID FROM tc_msg_mgmt AA , ( SELECT BA.OFC_ID , IFNULL(BB.OFC_NM, '-') AS OFC_NM , BA.PTET_ID , IFNULL(BC.PTET_NM, '-') AS PTET_NM , BA.WRQ_DVS_COD , IFNULL(V_WRQ_DVS_COD.DTL_COD_NM, '-') AS WRQ_DVS_COD_NM , IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(BD.SEND_DT, '%Y.%m.%d'), '-') AS DLVR_DT , IFNULL(BE.RCVR_NM, '-') AS RCVR_NM , CONCAT(BE.ADRS, ' ', BE.DTL_ADRS) AS DLVR_INFO , IFNULL(CONCAT(V_CURR_COD.DTL_COD_NM, (CASE WHEN BD.IVC_NUM IS NULL OR BD.IVC_NUM = '' THEN '' ELSE CONCAT('(',BD.IVC_NUM,')') END)), '-') AS CURR_INFO FROM tm_odr_mst BA INNER JOIN tm_ofc_mst BB ON BA.OFC_ID = BB.OFC_ID INNER JOIN tm_ptet_mst BC ON BA.PTET_ID = BC.PTET_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN tn_curr_info BD ON BA.ODR_ID = BD.ODR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN tn_odr_dlvr_info BE ON BA.ODR_ID = BE.ODR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DTL_COD , DTL_COD_NM , ODR FROM tc_comn_dtl_cod WHERE GRP_COD = 'WRQ_DVS_COD' ) V_WRQ_DVS_COD ON BA.WRQ_DVS_COD = V_WRQ_DVS_COD.DTL_COD LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DTL_COD , DTL_COD_NM , ODR FROM tc_comn_dtl_cod WHERE GRP_COD = 'CURR_COD' ) V_CURR_COD ON BD.CURR_COD = V_CURR_COD.DTL_COD WHERE BA.ODR_ID = #{odr_id} ) AB WHERE AA.MSG_ID = #{msg_id}

/* kr.kosmo.jobkorea.commonbiz.dao.MsgMgmtDao.selectMsgInfoC_ */ SELECT REPLACE(AA.EML_TITL, '#OFC_NM#', AB.OFC_NM) AS EML_TITL , REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(AA.EML_CNTS, '#OFC_NM#', AB.OFC_NM) , '#PMT_QNTY#', AB.PMT_QNTY) , '#DPSR_NM#', AB.DPSR_NM) , '#CASH_AMUT#', AB.CASH_AMUT) AS EML_CNTS , AA.TO_EML_ADRS , AA.SMS_TITL , AA.SMS_CNTS , AA.TO_PNN , AA.FST_ENLM_DTT , AA.FST_RGST_SST_ID , AA.FNL_MDFD_DTT , AA.FNL_MDFR_SST_ID FROM tc_msg_mgmt AA , ( SELECT BA.OFC_ID , IFNULL(BB.OFC_NM, '-') AS OFC_NM , BC.DPSR_NM , FORMAT(BC.PMT_QNTY, 0) AS PMT_QNTY , FORMAT(IFNULL(BD.CASH_AMUT, 0) ,0) AS CASH_AMUT FROM tm_odr_mst BA INNER JOIN tm_ofc_mst BB ON BA.OFC_ID = BB.OFC_ID INNER JOIN tn_odr_pmt_info BC ON BA.ODR_ID = BC.ODR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN tn_ofc_cash BD ON BA.OFC_ID = BD.OFC_ID WHERE BA.ODR_ID = #{odr_id} AND BC.MOP_DVS_COD = '60' ) AB WHERE AA.MSG_ID = #{msg_id}

/* kr.kosmo.jobkorea.commonbiz.dao.MsgMgmtDao.selectMsgInfoM_ */ SELECT REPLACE( REPLACE(AA.EML_TITL, '#WTR_OFC_NM#', AB.WTR_OFC_NM) , '#PTET_NM#', AB.PTET_NM) AS EML_TITL , REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE( REPLACE(AA.EML_CNTS, '#WTR_OFC_NM#', AB.WTR_OFC_NM) , '#PTET_NM#', AB.PTET_NM) , '#OFC_NM#', AB.OFC_NM) , '#WTR_NM#', AB.WTR_NM) AS EML_CNTS , AA.TO_EML_ADRS , AA.SMS_TITL , AA.SMS_CNTS , AA.TO_PNN , AA.FST_ENLM_DTT , AA.FST_RGST_SST_ID , AA.FNL_MDFD_DTT , AA.FNL_MDFR_SST_ID FROM tc_msg_mgmt AA , ( SELECT BB.OFC_NM AS WTR_OFC_NM , BA.WTR_NM , BC.PTET_NM , BD.OFC_NM FROM tn_mak_cmt BA INNER JOIN tm_ofc_mst BB ON BA.OFC_ID = BB.OFC_ID INNER JOIN tm_ptet_mst BC ON BA.PTET_ID = BC.PTET_ID INNER JOIN tm_ofc_mst BD ON BC.OFC_ID = BD.OFC_ID WHERE BA.CMT_ID = #{cmt_id} ) AB WHERE AA.MSG_ID = #{msg_id}
